original_text: But you know that he appeared so that he might take away our sins. And in him is no sin.
korean_text: 그가 우리 죄를 없애려고 나타나신 것을 너희가 아나니 그에게는 죄가 없느니라

sentences.original_text: But you know that he appeared
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 당신은 그가 나타났다는 것을 압니다

sentences.original_text: so that he might take away our sins
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그가 우리의 죄를 없애시기 위함입니다

sentences.original_text: And in him is no sin
